test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of the authentication controller. They cover scenarios of successful login, invalid credentials, missing password, and service failure.

The test verifies the LoginService's authenticate_user function under various conditions, including successful login, account locked scenario, invalid password, non-existent user, and locked after multiple failed attempts.
The tests verify the behavior of the login endpoint of the account_lock_controller, covering successful and failed login attempts, as well as various invalid and missing request data scenarios.

The test code verifies the login functionality of an account lockout controller, covering scenarios such as missing user ID, missing password, successful login, account lockout due to multiple failed attempts, and unsuccessful login due to incorrect credentials.

This test suite verifies the authentication functionality of the AuthService class. It covers scenarios such as successful authentication, incorrect password, user not found, empty and null credentials, and logs for both successful and failed authentication attempts.
